v8:item.v8:content: Do not show group selection question

Settings.QueryText:
SELECT Counterparties.Ref, Counterparties.Description, Counterparties.IsFolder, NestedSelect.Presentation AS FilledCIKinds FROM Catalog.Counterparties AS Counterparties LEFT JOIN (SELECT CounterpartiesContactInformation.Ref AS Ref, COUNT(CounterpartiesContactInformation.Presentation) AS Presentation FROM Catalog.Counterparties.ContactInformation AS CounterpartiesContactInformation WHERE CounterpartiesContactInformation.Type IN(&CITypes)
GROUP BY CounterpartiesContactInformation.Ref) AS NestedSelect ON Counterparties.Ref = NestedSelect.Ref
